sources.title: Design for Murder
sources.description: Title: Design for Murder Summary: A somewhat unbalanced college student kidnaps the leader of a group of students that has been constantly mocking and harassing him, and plans to bury him alive in a trunk. Directed by: Roy Boulting Actors: Manning Whiley, Barbara Everest, Michael Drake Production Company: Charter Film Productions Release Date: 27 November 1940 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A somewhat unbalanced college student kidnaps the leader of a group of students that has been constantly mocking and harassing him, and plans to bury him alive in a trunk.
